Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum I2c_IOCTL

I2C Ioctl commands.

I2C Ioctl commands

Enumerator
IOCTL_I2C_GET_BUS_FREQUENCY 

< IOCTL for probing the i2c instance>

IOCTL_I2C_SET_BUS_FREQUENCY 

< IOCTL to get I2C Bus frequency>

IOCTL_I2C_RESET_CONTROLLER 

< IOCTL to set I2C Bus frequency>

IOCTL_I2C_RECOVER_BUS 

< IOCTL reset I2C controller> < IOCTL to force 9 clk pulses>

Function Documentation

Int32 I2c_GlobalDeInit ( Ptr  args)

De-initializes I2C Instances.

De-initializes the I2C controllers. If there are open handles, they are invalidated. It should be called only after calling Bsp_i2cInit and in the end when I2C driver is no more required by any user.

Parameters
args[IN] Not used currently. Meant for future purpose.
Returns
IOM_COMPLETED on success else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 I2c_GlobalInit ( UInt32  numInst,
I2c_DevInitParams *  devInitPrms 
)

Initialize I2C controller(s)

Initializes I2C controller(s) with the initPrms structure. User should pass configuration information for numInst controllers. This function should be called before calling any of driver APIs and should be called only once.

Parameters
numInst[IN] Number of I2C controllers need to be initialized
devInitPrms[IN] Configuration for numInst controllers.
Returns
IOM_COMPLETED on success else appropriate error code on failure.
